step.text: Click on the textfield and enter your searchterm.
All results of the search will be displayed here. You can navigate through the resultlist by pressing down or up key. By pressing enter afterwards you will confirm the selection.

Notice that it exist more keyboard shortcuts for make searching easier:

alt + r = Supersearch new search
alt + e = Supersearch category "all" search
alt + c = Supersearch category "contents" search
alt + t = Supersearch category "tasks" search
alt + n = Supersearch category "news" search
alt + a = Supersearch category "accounts" search
alt + s = Supersearch category "sites" search
